text.autoconfig.chromaanvils.title: §4§lChromaAnvils Config
text.autoconfig.chromaanvils.option.Anvi:
§4What does this do?
§7This determines how many characters you can type to anvils text filed
text.autoconfig.chromaanvils.option.Name: Name Limit

§4What does this do?
§7This determines how many characters you can have in the final name
excluding the color/style tags
text.autoconfig.chromaanvils.option.Blac:
§4What does this do?
§7This allows you to blacklist what items
can not have colored names!

§7Example: §cminecraft:name_tag
